meanings.definition: A pair of bones in the skull forming the lower part of the nasal septum.
meanings.sent1: The vomers help support the nasal septum.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the vomers on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The vomers decided to take a break from holding up the nasal septum.
meanings.sent4: The vomers stood strong like pillars in the skull.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the delicate structure of the vomers in my nose.

meanings.sent1: She studied the vomers in detail during anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon carefully removed the damaged vomer bone.
meanings.sent3: The vomer bone rolled off the table during the dissection.
meanings.sent4: The vomer bone was as sturdy as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The vomer bone's shape was etched in my memory after the lesson.
